segments.text: I'm going over to the gym . I want to do some running .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you run outside ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you kidding ? Do you know how cold it is today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I suppose . I guess it isn't healthy to run in this weather .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it's not . Not at all . I'd probably freeze my lungs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait for me a minute . I'll go over to the gym too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , why not ? Just let me get my gym clothes together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn't know you could exercise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you mean by that ? Everyone can exercise !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I know . But you ? I always thought you were only good at lifting beer bottles to your mouth .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not at all . I was on the swimming team in high school.And I'd like to do some weight training . They have decent equipment at that gym .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're going to lift weights ? Hah !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you laughing at me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry . I just can't imagine you lifting weights .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe not . But I want to start . I need to get in shape . I feel these past couple months that my energy is low .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's true . If a person doesn't exercise , they get sluggish.That ' s why I keep running . Even in the winter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So I need to do something too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But lifting weights isn't the best thing.You should do some kind of aerobic exercise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . But I want to start today with a little weight lifting.Then I'm going to buy a new swimming suit and goggles , and every other day I'm going to go swim laps in the pool . How does that sound ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds like a good plan to me . I'm still ... I mean ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm still just surprised you really want to do it.It doesn't seem to go with your character .
segments.speaker: S1
